attributes.action: require all MPs to publish a monthly report of their personal actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As in industry, we expect our employees to account for their personal accomplishments every month.  Their report should summarise where they spent their time, what they have accomplished and failed to complete, what they hope to complete next month and ask for further ideas of what they should aim for on behalf of their 'employers'
